Queries.Query: INSERT INTO Session (ExternalId, EncryptionKey, CreationDate, LastAccessDate, TimeToLiveInSeconds) VALUES (@externalId, @encryptionKey, @creationDate, @lastAccessDate, @timeToLiveInSeconds)
SELECT Id, ExternalId, EncryptionKey, CreationDate, LastAccessDate, TimeToLiveInSeconds FROM Session
SELECT Id, ExternalId, EncryptionKey, CreationDate, LastAccessDate, TimeToLiveInSeconds FROM Session Where ExternalId = @externalId
SELECT Id, ExternalId, EncryptionKey, CreationDate, LastAccessDate, TimeToLiveInSeconds FROM Session Where Id = @id
